name: Craft sticks
goal: Craft sticks from planks or bamboo
notes: Sticks are used in nearly every tool, weapon, and many other recipes (torches, ladders, signs, fences, rails, etc.). 2 planks placed vertically yield 4 sticks. 2 bamboo placed vertically yield 1 stick. Planks are the better source: 1 log -> 4 planks -> 8 sticks. Can be crafted in the 2x2 player crafting grid — no crafting table needed. Sticks can also be obtained from: dead bushes (0-2 sticks), leaf blocks (rare drop), fishing (as junk), witch drops, and bonus chest loot.

steps.title: Obtain planks or bamboo
steps.details: You need 2 planks of any type or 2 bamboo items. If you have logs, craft them into planks first (1 log = 4 planks). Planks give 4 sticks per 2 planks. Bamboo only gives 1 stick per 2 bamboo (very inefficient by comparison).
checks: Have at least 2 planks or 2 bamboo in inventory

steps.title: Craft sticks
steps.details: Place 2 planks vertically (one above the other) in the crafting grid. Yields 4 sticks. No crafting table required — works in the 2x2 player grid. Recipe: { "recipe": "stick", "count": 4 }. For bamboo: 2 bamboo vertically yields only 1 stick.
